parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Server Address
parameter.description: The host name or IP address of the remote openHAB server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Server HTTP Port
parameter.description: The HTTP port to be used to communicate with the remote openHAB server.

parameter.name: restPath
parameter.label: REST API Path
parameter.description: The subpath of the REST API on the remote openHAB server.

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: Token
parameter.description: The token to use when the remote openHAB server is setup to require authorization to run its REST API.

thing-type.label: Remote Thing
thing-type.description: A thing from the remote openHAB server.

parameter.name: thingUID
parameter.label: Remote Thing UID
parameter.description: The thing UID in the remote openHAB server.

parameter.name: buildChannels
parameter.label: Automatic Channels Building
parameter.description: If set to true, a trigger channel will be automatically created and linked to each trigger channel from the remote thing.

parameter.name: channelUID
parameter.label: Remote Channel UID
parameter.description: The channel UID in the remote openHAB server.
